subject: Harness Racing
lead_paragraph: See You At Peelers, the biggest star in harness racing, will attempt to run her record to 21-0 on Thursday in the New York Sire Stakes at Yonkers Raceway.
snippet: See You At Peelers, the biggest star in harness racing, will attempt to run her record to 21-0 on Thursday in the New York Sire Stakes at Yonkers Raceway.
